name: Summon (DDD2DDD)
description:
I didn't think of any other game when making this. I have absolutely no clue why it's kinda like Helltaker to me.

Just without some sick beats and waifu :'-(

Anyway, thanks for stopping by :-)     and have fun playing GMTK games.

*control*

WASD / arrow keys

'R' to restart

'.' to skip level
